column6: NECROSHA CHAPTER 3 Things get even deadlier with the arrival of Selene's Inner Circle at the X-Men's headquarters. With Eli Bard in tow, Wither, Mortis, Senyaka and Blink have come for one thing, and anyone who gets in their way will die.
column8: | colorist:Clayton Crain | penciller:Steve Dillon | other:Chris Eliopoulos | letterer:Cory Petit | writer:Duane Swierczynski | writer:Chris Yost
